DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : To evaluate safety performance Presillion stent routine clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Postmarket Surveillance Registry Evaluating Performance Long Term Safety Presillion Stent
DOC.detailed_description: Primary endpoint : Composite Major Adverse Cardiac Events ( MACE ) , include cardiac death , myocardial infarction ( Q-wave non Q-wave ) clinically drive target lesion revascularization ( TLR ) 12 month follow-up . Data collect 400 patient ( 14 hospital Spain Portugal ) treat Presillion stent 2 de novo native coronary artery lesion Study design : multicenter , prospective , observational
DOC.criteria: All subject treat Presillion stent two de novo coronary artery lesions No specified
